Class ServiceCall

  • java.lang.Object

  • public final class ServiceCall
extends java.lang.Object
    Type representing handle to the service call.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServiceCall

        public ServiceCall(retrofit2.Call<?> call)
        Creates a service call.

    • Method Detail

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Cancel this call. An attempt will be made to cancel in-flight calls, and if the call has not yet been executed it never will be.

      • isCanceled

        public boolean isCanceled()
        Check whether cancel() was called.
        Returns:
        true If cancel() was called.
